title: Graph the First Inequality
text: We must graph $$3x-2y \leq 6$$, which rearranges to $$y \geq \frac{-\left(6-3x\right)}{2}$$. We make the line solid and shade above it since we have $$ \geq $$.\n##figure2.gif##

title: Graph the Second Inequality
text: We must graph $$y>\frac{-1}{4} x+5$$. We make the line dashed and shade above it since we have >.\n##figure4.gif##

title: The solution is region where shading overlaps: Blue-red
